resources.string: - How God appeard to you this week ?
- How do you answer the call ?
- Is there an obstacle in your spiritual progression ?
- Do you want to talk about it ?
- Do you want us to pray for that ?
- Who do you want to pray for?
- What have you thought about the reading of the week ?
" Its purpose: an authentic experience of contagious disciples! "
" It is a small group of no more than three people, in which there is intense communion between these people and God."
" Pray for God to inspire me to be a spiritual partner."

" Example: Lord, with whom could I grow in my faith? Who do I feel confident with to be genuine and eager to go further with you? Thank you because you show me the voice, you inspire me in the time that is yours. "

" \"Pray for each other\". It is very encouraging to hear someone pray for you. But the GDC is also open to others . Each meeting ends with a moment of prayer for three people around me who need the presence of God. Thus, prayer changes my view of them, makes me more available, and makes me a witness of Jesus for them. "

"We have a habit of studying the Bible, reading commentaries or related books and that is important. But it's also good to learn reading the Bible in simple reading , letting the Spirit do the rest. This requires a steady and regular reading. Everyone has to adapt their rhythm. Some read up to 30 chapters a week! The important thing is to find out what rhythm allows me to be rooted in my relationship with God . "

" The questions revolve around three axes: my relationship to God, to others, and to myself . They are not there to condemn or judge, but to position oneself, to evoke struggles or sufferings, to become aware of victories and the road traveled, to see the action of God in his life, to imagine this action in the lives of others. These questions are a great way to learn \"letting go\" ."
The application allows you to follow the progress of a GDC and to note certain information.
" The \"Praying\" section allows you to add prayer topics that you share with your partner."

The \"Share\" section explains the course of a meeting and helps to guide the conversation with suggestions for questions to exchange. By pressing \"Add\", you can customize this guide by the questions you want.

" The section \"Read\" allows you to note week by week the passages you have read by pressing \"Add\". By pressing \"read\" in front of the reading of the week, you will switch to the beginning of the corresponding text in the Bible YouVersion application."
